document_data.name: Malrinth Alont
document_data.mainbody: '''Malrinth Alont''' was a [[half-elf]] [[diviner]] who specialized in informational [[magic]].
document_data.Description: Malrinth had light skin, blue eyes, and blonde hair partially tied into a bun. She had a pug nose, pointed ears, and wore an elaborate piece of hair jewelry.
document_data.Personality: A firm believer in knowledge being the most important factor in any venture, Malrinth preferred working out of her study, only taking to the road when a mystery necessitated travel. She was uncommonly fond of the sea and all things related to it.
document_data.Possessions: Malrinth owned a powerful ''[[ring of protection]]'', in addition to her [[dagger]] and [[spellbook]].
